Comment 4: 
The missing piece is this:

"5. The scope of a constant or variable identifier declared inside a function begins at
the end of the ConstSpec or VarSpec (ShortVarDecl for short variable declarations) and
ends at the end of the innermost containing block."[0]

Note the "at the end" part.

  [0]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#Declarations_and_scope
